item.title: Building A Manabase For Pioneer
item.author: Kerrick Long
item.description: Pioneer’s initial ban list only includes five cards: the fetch lands. What does this mean for building a manabase? In this article we explore the multi-color lands available in the format, the best specialty mono-color lands, and what utility lands you might consider including. Does banning the fetch lands prevent three- and four-color decks like Wizards hopes? Read More

item.title: Wizards of the Coast Announces Pioneer Format!
item.author: Mrs. Mulligan
item.description: As explained in their official blog post, Wizards of the Coast announced a new format today: Pioneer. Like Modern, the Pioneer format does not rotate, and includes cards that have been in standard since a certain set. But unlike Modern, it starts at Return to Ravnica, leaving a much smaller card pool to work with. What does this mean for your old Standard decks? How does mana work in this format? All this and more in PioneerPilot.com’s first article. Read More
